mapper.insert: MERGE INTO VISITOR_LOG v USING DUAL ON (v.USER_ID = #{userId} AND v.VISIT_DATE = TRUNC(SYSDATE)) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (USER_ID) VALUES (#{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(VISIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS label, COUNT(*) AS value FROM VISITOR_LOG WHERE VISIT_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE - 6) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(VISIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY label
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VISITOR_LOG WHERE VISIT_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE - 6)
SELECT TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS label, COUNT(*) AS value FROM USERS WHERE CREATED_AT >= TRUNC(SYSDATE - 6) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY label
SELECT NVL(SUM(AMOUNT), 0) FROM GAME_WALLET_LOG WHERE LOG_TYPE = 1 AND TRUNC(CREATED_AT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS label, -- 일자별로 그룹화된 X축 레이블 SUM(AMOUNT) AS value -- 각 날짜별 매출 합계 (Y축 값) FROM GAME_WALLET_LOG WHERE LOG_TYPE = 1 -- '사용' 유형만 집계 (1 = 사용) AND CREATED_AT >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 6 -- 최근 7일 데이터 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') -- 날짜 기준 그룹화 ORDER BY label -- 오름차순 정렬
